Summary[edit]

DescriptionFlag of Ascension Island PD.svg
English: Coat of arms of Ascension Island is traced from the bitmap available at the website of government of Ascension Island. The Government Ensign of the United Kingdom which is used as background of the flag is available as Public Domain.
Date 6 August 2014, 19:41:22
Source Own work
Author Shervinafshar
